title: 2019 Vanguard 53' Semi-Trailer
item_description:
2019 Vanguard 53' Semi-Trailer

Trailer Details

  • Year: 2019
  • Make: Vanguard
  • Model: 53’ Trailer
  • VIN: 5V8VC5324KM901971
  • License: 4TV2626
    • Expiration Date: 3/31/2028
  • Gross Vehicle Weight Rating (GVWR): 68,000lb
  • Trailer Type: Enclosed

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 633”
  • Overall Width: 102”
  • Overall Height: 159”
  • Deck Length: 624”
  • Deck Width: 101”
  • Side Height: 109”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Air Ride
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Brake Type: Air
  • Number of Wheels: 8
  • Tire Size: 295/75R22.5
  • Electric Plug Type: 7-Way Round
  • Hitch: 5th Wheel

Note: This item was repossessed by the Bank; the Certificate of Title, Certificate of Repossession, and Transfer Form will be mailed 1-2 weeks following the removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the inspections, transfer, registration, taxes, and fees due to DMV.
